title: Credit Suisse
subtitle: Technology Intern
details: Developed an Admin Dashboard for Rockhopper, a trade query and trade entry system for Credit Suisse's Equity Derivatives trading business, reducing around 2 hours of the system admin's time.
Conducted a Demonstration Session for the frontend team of the Equity and Derivatives Department on React Query, which was later used for caching data on the SphereUnderlyings portal.
Improved the User Interface for SphereUnderlyings, a web-based global client intelligence platform, hence enchancing the User Experience in UAT.

title: Pingolearn
subtitle: Mobile App Development Intern
details: Developed and maintained Pingolearn, a language learning app in Flutter.
Designed assessments for hiring candidates for full-time roles.

title: Manastik
subtitle: Software Engineer Intern
details: Digitalized the Hindi Mental State Examination (HMSE) by developing the Dementia Active Diagnosis and Tracking (DADT) app in Flutter.
